## How to Run / Verify

```bash
bun install
bun run dev
# Then open http://localhost:6006
```

## Checklist

- [ ] `bun install` works clean
- [ ] Lint passes: `bun run lint`
- [ ] Tests pass: `bun run test`
- [ ] Build succeeds: `bun run build`
- [ ] Feature works as described
- [ ] TODO.md updated
- [ ] WORKLOG.md updated
